title: Nadia Joins A..AA
text:
Email 0 
Further boosting an already ensemble cast of filmmaker Trivikram’s upcoming romantic drama A...Aa, popular actress Nadiya Moidu has been roped in to play a crucial role in the film. 
“Nadiya really liked how Trivikram etched her character. She’s really excited and is expected to join the sets very soon,” said the film’s spokesperson. 
Nadiya was also part of Trivikram’s 2013 blockbuster Attarintiki Daredi and sources close to the director reveal that her performance in the Pawan Kalyan-starrer was one of the major reasons for casting Nadiya yet again. A...Aa, which will be produced S Radha Krishna of Haarika and Hassine banner, features Nithiin Reddy and Samantha Ruth Prabhu in the lead roles.
